mapper.insert: insert into alarm(a_no, m_id, b_no, a_check, ac_code, clickid) values(seq_alarm.nextval, #{m_id}, #{b_no}, 'NO', #{ac_code}, #{clickid})
insert into alarm(a_no, m_id, g_no, a_check, ac_code, clickid) values(seq_alarm.nextval, #{m_id}, #{g_no}, 'NO', #{ac_code}, #{clickid})
mapper.select: select * from alarm where m_id = #{m_id} order by a_no desc
mapper.update: update alarm set a_check='YES' where a_no=#{a_no}
